Title: NGX group CEO highlights market resilience in dialogue on tax reforms
Summary: Nigerian Exchange Group convenes high-level stakeholder dialogue on Capital Gains Tax (CGT) provisions within the Tax Reform Act 2024, set to take effect in January 2026 . NGX group CEO highlights market resilience in dialogue on tax reforms .

Title: Insecurity: ADC says Tinubu unqualified to seek UNSC seat
Summary: African Democratic Congress (ADC) criticised President Bola Tinubu’s administration for seeking a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) while insecurity in the country remains unabated .

Title: Zamfara mine collapse: FG deploys rescue operations
Summary: FG deploys federal mines officers to lead rescue operations at a mining pit that collapsed in Kadauri Village, Maru Local Council of Zamfara State . The Ministry of Solid Minerals Development, yesterday, disclosed deployment of mines officers .

Title: Resident doctors issue FG 30-day ultimatum over unmet demands
Summary: Resident doctors issue 30-day ultimatum to Federal Government to address outstanding welfare and policy demands affecting its members . The Nigerian Association of Resident Doctors (NARD) has issued a 30-year ultimeatum to the Federal Government .

Title: ‘Predators’: how reality TV explains Epstein obsession
Summary: A new documentary asks why America is so fascinated with child sex abusers by reflecting on the salacious 2000s reality TV series “To Catch A Predator” The infamous NBC show .

Title: Crude oil production rose to 1.8m bdp — FG
Summary: Nigeria’s oil production rose to 1.8 million barrels per day, from 1 million . Senator Heineken Lokpobiri said the goal is to reach 2.5 million bdp . U.S. companies are already showing strong interest in investing in Nigerian oil blocks .

Title: Nigeria gains global recognition for Tax-ID
Summary: Nigeria has secured a major milestone in its digital trade transformation . The Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) has been approved as the country’s Peppol Authority . The achievement was made possible with the support of the Standards Organisation of Nigeria (SON)

Title: Why we must drive Africa’s capital market with technology — Owoturo
Summary: The Chief Executive Officer, Coronation Registrar Limited, Oluseyi Owoturo, stressed the importance of technology in driving Africa's capital market . In June 2025, the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) directed public companies and their registrars to comply with the Finance Act .

Title: NNPCL monthly profit rises 91% to N539bn
Summary: NNPCL monthly profit rises 91.3 percent to N539 billion in August 2025, up from N185 billion recorded in July . According to its Monthly Report Summary, the company’s revenue rose to N4.655 trillion .
